author: vilela
title: AdaQuad - Crowdfunding Platform
description: How can we develop a quick collective decision-making funding method that also balances the voting power of quite different wallet sizes?
solution: Design a voting and funding method for Cardano Catalyst and other DOAs in the Cardano ecosystem.
experience: Photrek successfully completed the Diversity Voting Influence project. Team: econophysist, system engineer, and Plutus/Atala Prism developer
